dt-example.title: Force Search on Enter
dt-example.info:
This example demonstrates the behaviour of `-init searchBuilder.enterSearch`. When this initialisation option is set to `true` searches will only be triggered on input elements when the enter key is pressed. The exception to this rule is when selecting a date using the date-picker, this will trigger a search automatically.
When the initialisation option is set to `false` a search will be triggered on every keypress, unless `-init searchDelay` is being implemented. This is the default for SearchBuilder.
